questions.title: Design a URL Shortener
questions.prompt: Design a URL shortener. Cover: APIs, storage schema, key generation, and scaling reads/writes.
followups: How do you handle hot keys and caching?
How do you prevent abuse/spam?

questions.title: Queue-Based Background Jobs
questions.prompt: You need to process uploads asynchronously. How would you design a background job system using a queue?
followups: How do you handle retries and poison messages?
How would you ensure at-least-once vs exactly-once behavior?

questions.title: Database Indexing Strategy
questions.prompt: A query is slow on a large table. How do you decide what index to add and validate it helped?
followups: What are trade-offs of adding indexes (writes/storage)?
What is a composite index and when is it useful?

questions.title: Consistent Hashing (Conceptual)
questions.prompt: Explain consistent hashing and why it's used in distributed systems.
followups: How does it reduce rebalancing when nodes change?
Where have you seen it used (caches, sharding)?

questions.title: Merge Intervals
questions.prompt: Given a list of intervals, merge all overlapping intervals. Explain your approach and complexity.
followups: What edge cases would you test?
Can you do it in-place?

questions.title: Webhook Delivery System
questions.prompt: Design a webhook system: events are generated internally and delivered to customer endpoints. Cover retries, backoff, and deduplication.
followups: How do you sign webhooks securely?
How do you handle customer endpoints that are slow or down?

questions.title: Chunked File Uploads
questions.prompt: Design an upload service that supports large files, resumable uploads, and virus scanning.
followups: How do you handle partial uploads and cleanup?
Where do you store upload state (DB, Redis)?

questions.title: Design an Email Verification Flow
questions.prompt: Design email verification for new users: token generation, expiry, and resend behavior.
followups: How do you prevent token leakage and replay?
How do you rate limit resends?

questions.title: Design a Notification Service
questions.prompt: Design a notifications system that can send email/push/in-app notifications. Cover APIs and storage at a high level.
followups: How do you avoid duplicate notifications?
How do you handle user preferences and unsubscribes?

questions.title: Design a Comment System
questions.prompt: Design a comments feature for a post: create, delete, list with pagination, and moderation.
followups: How would you index for fast reads?
How do you handle soft delete vs hard delete?

questions.title: Zero-Downtime Database Migration
questions.prompt: You need to add a non-null column to a large table without downtime. What steps do you follow?
followups: How do you backfill safely?
How do you deploy app changes around the migration?

questions.title: Design a Multi-Tenant SaaS Schema
questions.prompt: How do you design a database schema for multi-tenant data? Compare shared tables with tenant_id vs separate schemas/databases.
followups: How do you prevent tenant data leaks?
How do you handle noisy neighbors?

questions.title: Caching Strategy for a Read-Heavy Endpoint
questions.prompt: An endpoint is read-heavy and slow. Design a caching strategy (what to cache, TTL, invalidation).
followups: Cache-aside vs write-through: when would you choose each?
How do you handle stale data?

questions.title: Design a Leaderboard (Top N)
questions.prompt: Design a leaderboard that shows top N users by score and supports score updates.
followups: What storage fits best (sorted set, DB index) and why?
How do you handle ties and pagination?

questions.title: Implement Kth Largest Element
questions.prompt: Given an array of integers and k, return the kth largest element. Explain complexity and approaches.
followups: When is quickselect better than a heap?
What edge cases do you test?

questions.title: Design Search Autocomplete
questions.prompt: Design autocomplete for a search box. Discuss data structures and ranking at a high level.
followups: Trie vs prefix index: trade-offs?
How do you keep results fresh as data changes?

questions.title: Per-User Rate Limits Across Servers
questions.prompt: You want per-user rate limits across multiple servers. Outline a design that is accurate and fast.
followups: What trade-off between accuracy and speed is acceptable?
How do you handle burst traffic?

questions.title: Delayed Job Scheduler (Simple)
questions.prompt: Design a system to schedule jobs to run at a future time (delayed jobs).
followups: How do you handle retries and duplicates?
How do you scale workers safely?

questions.title: Idempotency in a Multi-Instance API
questions.prompt: Design idempotency for a POST endpoint in a multi-instance deployment, including data storage and expiry.
followups: How do you choose idempotency key TTL?
How do you handle large request bodies?

questions.title: Observability: Metrics, Logs, Traces
questions.prompt: What metrics/logs/traces would you add to debug latency in a production API?
followups: How do you identify the slow dependency?
What SLOs would you define?

questions.title: Cache Consistency for User Profiles
questions.prompt: You cache user profiles in Redis. How do you keep cache consistent when user updates happen?
followups: What cache invalidation strategies would you consider?
How do you prevent cache stampedes?

questions.title: Design a Recommendation Endpoint (Simple)
questions.prompt: Design an endpoint that returns recommended items for a user. Discuss what you would precompute vs compute on request.
followups: How do you evaluate quality and latency?
How do you handle cold start users?

questions.title: Debugging a Production Incident
questions.prompt: A service started returning 500s after a deploy. Walk through your incident response and debugging steps.
followups: What signals do you check first?
How do you prevent this next time?

questions.title: Design a Large Backfill Job
questions.prompt: You need to backfill a new derived field for 50 million rows. How do you design the backfill job?
followups: How do you make it resumable?
How do you monitor progress and failures?

questions.title: Merge K Sorted Lists
questions.prompt: Merge k sorted linked lists. Explain your approach and complexity.
followups: What if lists are very long?
How do you test performance?

questions.title: Design a Real-time Chat System
questions.prompt: Design a basic real-time chat system with features like messaging, typing indicators, and online status.
followups: How would you handle message persistence?
What are the challenges with scaling WebSocket connections?

questions.title: Implement a Trie
questions.prompt: Implement a trie data structure with insert, search, and startsWith operations.
followups: What are the time complexities for each operation?
How would you implement autocomplete using a trie?

questions.title: Design a Distributed Counter
questions.prompt: Design a system to maintain a global counter (like view counts) that can be incremented from multiple servers.
followups: How do you handle concurrent increments?
What trade-offs exist between accuracy and performance?

questions.title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
questions.prompt: Find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.
followups: What's the optimal time complexity?
How would you extend this to find the substring itself?

questions.title: Design a Rate Limiter with Redis
questions.prompt: Implement a sliding window rate limiter using Redis. Explain the data structures and algorithm.
followups: How does this compare to token bucket implementation?
How do you handle race conditions in distributed Redis?

questions.title: Design a Simple Search Engine
questions.prompt: Design a basic search engine for documents. Cover indexing, query processing, and ranking.
followups: How would you handle spelling corrections?
What data structures are optimal for inverted indexes?

questions.title: Implement a Circular Buffer
questions.prompt: Design and implement a circular buffer/ring buffer with O(1) operations.
followups: How would you make it thread-safe?
What are practical use cases for circular buffers?

questions.title: Design a File Upload Service with CDN
questions.prompt: Design a file upload service that stores files in cloud storage and serves them via CDN.
followups: How do you handle file access permissions?
What about virus scanning and content moderation?

questions.title: Find All Anagrams in a String
questions.prompt: Given a string s and a pattern p, find all starting indices of p's anagrams in s.
followups: What's the time and space complexity?
How would you optimize for large alphabets?

questions.title: Design a Social Graph
questions.prompt: Design a system to store and query social connections (friends, followers).
followups: How would you store edges for efficient traversal?
How do you find mutual friends efficiently?

questions.title: Implement a Thread Pool
questions.prompt: Design a thread pool with fixed number of worker threads and a task queue.
followups: How do you handle task failures?
How would you implement graceful shutdown?

questions.title: Design a Shopping Cart System
questions.prompt: Design a shopping cart system for an e-commerce platform with features like add/remove items, price calculation, and expiration.
followups: How do you handle concurrent modifications?
How would you implement cart abandonment tracking?

questions.title: Word Break Problem
questions.prompt: Given a string and a dictionary of words, determine if the string can be segmented into space-separated dictionary words.
followups: What's the time complexity of DP solution?
How would you return all possible segmentations?

questions.title: Design a Metrics Aggregation System
questions.prompt: Design a system to collect, aggregate, and query metrics from multiple services.
followups: How do you handle high cardinality dimensions?
What storage backend would you choose (time-series DB vs OLAP)?

questions.title: Implement a Least Recently Used (LRU) Cache
questions.prompt: Implement an LRU cache with O(1) get and put operations.
followups: How would you make it thread-safe?
What about implementing an LFU cache?

questions.title: Design a Feature Flag System
questions.prompt: Design a feature flag/toggle system that allows rolling out features to specific users or percentages.
followups: How do you ensure low latency flag evaluation?
How would you audit flag changes?

questions.title: Container With Most Water
questions.prompt: Given n non-negative integers representing height, find two lines that together with x-axis form a container holding most water.
followups: What's the intuition behind the two-pointer solution?
How would you prove the algorithm's correctness?

questions.title: Design a Distributed Lock Service
questions.prompt: Design a distributed lock service for coordinating access to shared resources across multiple servers.
followups: How do you handle lock expiration and renewal?
What are the challenges with clock drift?

questions.title: Implement a Binary Search Tree Iterator
questions.prompt: Implement an iterator over a binary search tree that has next() and hasNext() operations.
followups: What's the time and space complexity?
How would you handle modifications to the tree during iteration?

questions.title: Design a Video Streaming Service
questions.prompt: Design a basic video streaming service with upload, processing, and playback capabilities.
followups: How do you handle different video qualities?
What about live streaming vs on-demand?

questions.title: Course Schedule (Topological Sort)
questions.prompt: Given courses and prerequisites, determine if you can finish all courses (detect cycle in directed graph).
followups: How would you find a valid course order?
What's the time complexity for adjacency list?

questions.title: Design a API Gateway
questions.prompt: Design an API gateway that handles routing, authentication, rate limiting, and logging for microservices.
followups: How do you handle service discovery?
What about circuit breaking and fallbacks?

questions.title: Implement a Min Stack
questions.prompt: Design a stack that supports push, pop, top, and retrieving the minimum element in constant time.
followups: What's the space complexity?
How would you extend this to support max as well?

questions.title: Design a Distributed Task Scheduler
questions.prompt: Design a system to schedule and execute tasks across a cluster of workers.
followups: How do you ensure tasks are executed exactly once?
How would you prioritize different types of tasks?

questions.title: Number of Islands
questions.prompt: Given a 2D grid of '1's (land) and '0's (water), count the number of islands.
followups: Compare DFS and BFS approaches
How would you handle very large grids that don't fit in memory?

questions.title: Design a Content Management System
questions.prompt: Design a CMS for creating, editing, and publishing web content with versioning and access control.
followups: How would you implement draft vs published states?
What about content search and tagging?

questions.title: Serialize and Deserialize Binary Tree
questions.prompt: Design an algorithm to serialize and deserialize a binary tree.
followups: What serialization format would you choose?
How do you handle null values?

questions.title: Design a Payment Processing System
questions.prompt: Design a system to process payments with features like idempotency, receipts, and refunds.
followups: How do you handle payment gateway failures?
What about fraud detection?

questions.title: Validate Binary Search Tree
questions.prompt: Given a binary tree, determine if it is a valid binary search tree.
followups: What's the time and space complexity?
How would you handle duplicate values?
